搜.definition: to search; variant of 蒐|搜[sou1]

搜刮.definition: to rake in (money); to plunder; to milk people dry

搜捕.definition: to hunt and arrest (fugitives); to track down and arrest; a manhunt

搜狐.definition: Sohu, Chinese web portal and online media company

搜狐網.definition: Sohu, Chinese web portal and online media company

搜狗.definition: Sogou, Chinese tech company known for its search engine, www.sogou.com

搜獲.definition: to find; to capture (after search); to uncover (evidence)

搜神記.definition: In Search of the Supernatural, compilation of legends about spirits, ghosts and other supernatural phenomena, written and compiled by 干寶|干宝[Gan1 Bao3] in Jin dynasty

搜索.definition: to search (a place, a database, online etc); to search for (sth)

搜索枯腸.definition: to rack one's brains (for apt wording etc) (idiom)

搜羅.definition: to gather; to collect; to bring together

搜腸刮肚.definition: to search one's guts and belly (idiom); to racks one's brains for a solution

搜身.definition: to do a body search; to frisk
